sen.j: 旧今津郵便局（きゅういまづゆうびんきょく）は滋賀県高島市にある歴史的建造物。
sen.e: The former Imazu post office is a historical building located in Takashima City in Shiga Prefecture.
The former Imazu post office is a historical building located in Takashima City in Shiga Prefecture.
The former Imazu post office is a historical building located in Takashima City in Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: ウィリアム・メレル・ヴォーリズの設計で1934年に今津郵便局舎として建設され、1978年まで使用され続けていた。
sen.e: Designed by William Merrell VORIES, the Imazu post office structure was built in 1934 and used continuously until 1978.
Designed by William Merrell VORIES, the Imazu post office structure was built in 1934 and used continuously until 1978.
Designed by William Merrell VORIES, the Imazu post office structure was built in 1934 and used continuously until 1978.

sen.j: ヴォーリズ通りに位置し、今津教会会堂や今津ヴォーリズ資料館と同じ並びにある。
sen.e: Located on Vories Street, it is located along side the Imazu Church and the Imazu Vories Resource Centre.
Located on Vories Street, it is located along side the Imazu Church and the Imazu Vories Resource Centre.
Located on Vories Street, it is located along side the Imazu Church and the Imazu Vories Museum.

sen.j: 建築概要
設計
- ヴォーリズ建築事務所
竣工
構造・規模
- 木造、地上2階、切妻造り、妻入り
sen.e: Wooden, 2 stories, kiritsuma-zukuri (gable roof style), Tsuma-iri (entrance on gable side)

sen.j: 所在地
- 滋賀県高島市今津町今津
sen.e: Imazu, Imazu-cho, Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture.
Imazu, Imazu-cho, Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture.
Imazu, Imazu-cho, Takashima City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 交通アクセス
西日本旅客鉄道湖西線 近江今津駅 徒歩10分
sen.e: 10 minutes walk from Omi Imazu Station on the Kosei Line of the West Japan Railway Company
10 minutes walk from Omi Imazu Station on the Kosei Line of the West Japan Railway Company
10 minutes walk from Omi Imazu Station on the Kosei Line of the West Japan Railway Company

sen.e: Lake Biwa and environs song archive
Lake Biwa and environs song archive
Biwako Shuko no Uta Shiryokan song museum

sen.j: ヴォーリズ通り
日本基督教団今津教会会堂
sen.e: Imazu Church, United Church of Christ in Japan
Imazu Church, United Church of Christ in Japan

sen.j: 今津ヴォーリズ資料館

住吉神社 (高島市)
阿志都弥神社・行過天満宮
sen.e: Ashizumi-jinja Shrine and Yukisugi Tenmangu Shrine

sen.j: 今津のザゼンソウ群落（滋賀県緑地環境保全地域：国内南限のざぜん草群生地）
sen.e: Imazu Zazenso (Symplocarpus foetidus) colony (Shiga Prefecture green zone protected area: domestic Japan southern most colony of Symplocarpus foetidus)
